revisionDesc.change: corrected values of @facs on second pb
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i write to say every thing has come all safe your letter with 2 dol dollars came on tuesday Tuesday and the dispach Dispatch cam about a couple of hours later and the draft came to day wensdayWednesday the dispach dispatch came just as George was going to start to go to Pheladelpha Philadelphia he went with a contract for the foundry men to sign they are to make pipe for the water works i was very glad it came before he left it made him feel much better when he knew you could let him have the money) he had been around to the agents but dident didn't make out any thing lottLott and several other
agents are looking out for him i hope they will suceedsucceed Georgey has had trouble enoughf enough all owing to not getting a loan on smiths Smith's house the houses is both insured and no mortgag mortgage nor nothing on smiths Smith's house it seems almost incredible to tell but so it is) i will get georgeGeorge to doo do what you say) he is having the morgage mortgage made out to Jeffy there will be no other claim on it and i think it has been a good thing for Jeff as well as georgeGeorge i suppose the masons will commence as soon as georgeGeorge comes back which will be to morrow i suppose) i hope you are well waltWalt i dreamed about seeing you last night waltWalt what is it you alluded to that was disagreable in the office) love to Oconors O'Connors and yourself

postscript.p: i am as well as usual
